name: Continuing Italian (Offered in Florence)
description: This course consists of a thorough review of grammatical structures and is designed to improve the students' self-expressiveness in Italian. Selections from contemporary authors and passages dealing with present-day issues are used as a basis for discussion in Italian. For students whose background in Italian is solely academic. In this course students may have the option of participating in an international learning experience that will have an additional cost and application process. [48L, 24P]
prerequisites: ITA100Y5/ITA101Y5 or permission of the department.
